name: High Voltage
baseMeaning: A yellow lightning bolt representing electricity.
tldr: Represents energy, speed, power, or electric personality. The 'charged up' emoji.

contextMeanings.meaning: High energy, speed, or powerful performance.
Quick action, fast results, or energetic effort.
contextMeanings.example: Delivered the project in record time ⚡

platformNotes.note: Used to emphasize speed, energy, or breaking news.
Popular for fitness and high-energy content.
Used to indicate quick responses or urgent items.

generationalNotes.note: Used for energy, speed, and hype.
Common in workout content and quick updates.
May interpret literally as electricity or weather.

seoTitle: ⚡ Lightning Emoji Meaning - What Does ⚡ Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the lightning emoji ⚡ really means in texting. Represents energy, speed, or power. Complete context guide.
